summary: In Nazi-occupied France, a Jewish child is sent away from his family and conceals his religious affiliation from the anti-Semitic elderly man that takes care of him.
cast: Michel Simon|Roger Carel|Paul Préboist|Luce Fabiole|Aline Bertrand|Sylvine Delannoy|Zorica Lozic|Jacqueline Rouillard|Marco Perrin|Denise Péron|Elisabeth Rey|Didier Perret|Kinou|Alain Cohen|Charles Denner|Yves Boussus
title: El viejo y el niño
